```{r include_packages, include = FALSE}
# installed and loaded. This hdlbrgdown package includes
# the template files for the thesis.
if(!require(devtools))
  install.packages("devtools", repos = "http://cran.rstudio.com")
if(!require(hdlbrgdown))
  devtools::install_github("christianholland/hdlbrgdown")
library(hdlbrgdown)
```
